heading: Power Australia Forward
subhead: When you support GetUp you're powering a million-strong, strategically savvy organisation that makes real change happen.
body: Your donation funds billboards that confront decision-makers, television advertising in key electorates, and grassroots rallies that show the strength of our community. We don't take corporate donations â€” that keeps us accountable to our community, not big business.

ctas.heading: Join GetUp Crew
ctas.copy: Become the driving force of our movement with a weekly or monthly contribution.

ctas.heading: Leave a gift in your will
ctas.copy: Protect our democracy for future generations with a legacy donation.
